thread.title: New Year Family Day, Fort Hamilton Senior Recreation Center, Brooklyn, 6 January 2024
thread.title_full: New Year Family Day, Fort Hamilton Senior Recreation Center, Brooklyn, 6 January 2024

author: NYC PARKS & REC
title: New Year Family Day, Fort Hamilton Senior Recreation Center, Brooklyn, 6 January 2024
text:
Advertisement Spend time with your family by trying a new activity or class!
About this Event
Spend time with your family and try a new activity or class with them! Now is the best time to do just that with the new year here!
Test out classes/programs at Fort Hamilton Recreation Center for one day for FREE! The center has multiple activities great for all ages, including art, dance, fitness, games, and sports. There is a fitness equipment space, as well, to work out in or work on your strength training with our TRX system. Learn something new with us today!
(This is a one-time offer for Saturday, January 6, 2024. Participants with previous one-day passes are not eligible for this offer. If you are interested in signing up for the membership afterward, you may inquire for more information with any center staff member.)
Advertisement Event Venue & Nearby Stays Fort Hamilton Senior Recreation Center, 9941 Fort Hamilton Parkway, Brooklyn, United States
Tickets USD 0.00
